title: unnaiyE nambinEn
sahitya:
unnaiyE nambinEn nAn tAnE ennaik-kAvAdirundiDa nalamO


anupallavi

  ulagiDarAl unadaDiyEn paDu tuyarE keDa ninaIvAi uyirE taruvAn shuDarAi 
varuvAi karuNAkaranE karam kuvittEn Uzhvinai tIrttu enakkuyir tanda paramanE


caraNam 1    mala mA mANavam kAmam mAyai maliginra ulagOr vAtaiyAl nondu vandEn
AvalAi pala kAlam unnai tuNai seyya vENDinEn nalam tara idu dadhi nAthanunin pAdam gati
    caraNam 2    vazhiyO kANAmal vandEn vandEn pudar muLLil vizhiyO pidungiDa vizhundEn azhunda pAsham 
shuTri azhivAm enaittEDi alainduDan kaNDu tOLil kaLIppAi sumandu mITTik-karuNai koL meippanAga
    caraNam 3    poyyAm ulagil uyir pizhaittiDa migu bhavam seidEn tirumukham vizhittiDa diDhanillai
kaiyum kaLavumAga kaNDukoNDAi ennil krpai seidu mITTuviuDum siranda maddhiyastanAga
    caraNam 4    bhavamE uruvAna bAdhakanin sollaik-kETTu balamE taruginra bhAva marak-kani tinrEn
avamAi anguDanE AkkinaiyumaDaiyAl tavalOkam vAzha jIvan tarumbiNaiyALiyAga
    caraNam 5    viDiyA naragilellAm muDiyAt-tuyaril vATTa aDiyEn manam tannai andhakAramAkkui adil
kuDiyAi irundukoNDu naragennai vIzhttum koDiya pEyin sirai mITka kuraivaTra mITpanAga
    caraNam 6    sattu siddhAnandamAi sarva paripUraNamAi shuddha pariushuddhanumAi tOnrum Adi kAraNamAi
cittam kaLikka anbar cintai kuDikoNDa dEvA natti varum maindanukku mutti tarum tandaiyAga
    caraNam 7    mAlai malargaL shUDi mangaLamAi manralAga shOlai tanil magizhndu tuyya kani tingaiyEden
AlamaLittu maNakkOlam seidu kUDi vAzha jnAlam vandu kUTTi sellum jnAna maNavALanAga
    caraNam 8    inajanam yAvum viTTu vandEn vandEn undan pinnAl dinamAgak-kUDa ninru tEDu selvam yAvum tandu
manam tanil anbu vaittu magizh mEl ulagum vAzha ananta nanmai seidu varum AbirahAm dEvanAga
